subject: p13135946
Findings: CHEST, SINGLE AP PORTABLE VIEW. A right subclavian central line is present, tip at SVC/RA junction overlying the uppermost RA. Status post sternotomy. Mild-to-moderate cardiomegaly. Small to moderate left effusion with underlying collapse and/or consolidation. Upper zone re-distribution and mild diffuse vascular blurring. Small right effusion. Prosthetic valve and additional mediastinal or upper abdominal clips noted. Compraed with, overall appearances are similar, but CHF findings may be slightly worse and the left effusion is probably slightly larger.
